references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for text-to-3D generation using 2D diffusion models, which is a significant contribution to the field and directly relevant to the current research.
This paper presents a method for high-resolution text-to-3D generation, addressing a key challenge in the field and providing a strong baseline for comparison.

references.paper_title: Wonder3D: Single image to 3D using cross-domain diffusion
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for single-image-to-3D generation using cross-domain diffusion, which is a significant advancement in the field and directly relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: DreamCraft3D: Hierarchical 3D generation with bootstrapped diffusion prior
references.reason: This paper introduces a hierarchical approach to 3D generation using diffusion models, improving the quality and realism of generated assets and serving as a relevant comparison method.

references.paper_title: GelSight: High-resolution robot tactile sensors for estimating geometry and force
references.reason: This paper introduces the GelSight tactile sensor, which is a crucial component of the current research and enables the acquisition of high-resolution tactile data for 3D generation.
